Player History
Injured on 5/14/1966 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by New York (A) on 4/15/1969...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/1/1971 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 6/19/1971 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 5/2/1973 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by California in 1976...
Injured on 7/21/1977 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Injured on 8/29/1982 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Released by California on 8/8/1986...
Drafted in 3rd round, 46th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1987...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/10/1992, off Andy McGaffigan (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/12/1993, off Dennis Rasmussen (PHI)...
Injured on 8/1/1994 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1994...
